title: Monday Post Show – Caitlin stops by… (08-23-21)
itunes:title: Monday Post Show – Caitlin stops by… (08-23-21)
description:
Caitlin stops by the post show and sits in. Bobby talks to Raymundo about how he promised a guy he would play a song that a songwriter wrote he met while golfing. Caitlin talks about her favorite Tim McGraw song. We also dive into Bobby’s eye health and how he got an exam from his father-in-law. Amy saw a girl on her flight trashing her because she could read her texts.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
